subject: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise
body:
[The Standard Chartered logo at the bank's London headquarters]
Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |
Basinghall Ave, London EC2V 5DD, UK
Telefax.+44-0-579016544

Attention. Mr. Denise

We acknowledge the received of your message  however your name was among the shortlisted name submitted to us by external debt commission for payment of your compensation funds.  Note that the total amount of your funds with us for payment to you is $10.5 Million Dollars only

In the same vain, we are on a strict obligation to ensure that your funds are credited to your account without delay. Be inform  that we have completed the necessary procedures towards crediting your funds to your designated bank account.

Further-more, we hereby advise you to send us your personal details with your receiving banking information to enable us process your funds  and credit to your account as quickly as possible.  Attach is my official identification for reference thank you.

Sincerely
Mr. Saif Malik.
Standard Chartered Bank Londo

subject: Re: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise
body:
Hello Mr. Saif Malik,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite surprising to hear that my name was submitted by the external debt commission for payment of funds. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in this context?

Also, I would like to understand more about these procedures that have been completed towards crediting the funds to my account. What were these procedures exactly? 

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise
body:
[The Standard Chartered logo at the bank's London headquarters]
Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |
Basinghall Ave, London EC2V 5DD, UK
Telefax.+44-0-579016544

Attention. Mr Denise

Sequel to your message,we did told you that you are among the shorlisted person submitted to us by external debt for onward crediting of your compensation funds value $10.5 Million Dollars which you lost in the hands of corrupt bank official and other government agency.

But before we commence processing of your funds crediting to your account.You will need to send us your personal details to enable us go through our computer data and once your personal details correspond with what we have right here in our computer record.

We shall inform you your funds transfer schedule and also credit your funds without delay thank you.

Sincerely
Mr. Saif Malik.
Standard Chartered Bank London

subject: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise we are sending your funds to government treasury
body:
[The Standard Chartered logo at the bank's London headquarters]
Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |
Basinghall Ave, London EC2V 5DD, UK
Telefax.+44-0-579016544

Attention. Mr. Denise

We have sent you messages severally without response from you. Your silent is an indication that you are no longer interested in receiving your funds anymore. In this juncture, you shall leave us with no option rather than to send your funds to government treasury any moment from now and close your file with us. Note that as soon as we send your funds to government treasury. That automatically becomes the end of the funds thank you.

Sincerely
Mr. Saif Malik.
Standard Chartered Bank London

subject: Re: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise we are sending your funds to government treasury
body:
Hello Mr. Saif Malik,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Standard Chartered Bank London. I must apologize if my silence has given the impression of disinterest, that was not my intention.

I am indeed interested in understanding more about these funds you mentioned. Could you please provide more details? For instance, how did these funds come into existence and why are they associated with my name?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise we are sending your funds to government treasury
body:
[The Standard Chartered logo at the bank's London headquarters]
Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |
Basinghall Ave, London EC2V 5DD, UK
Telefax.+44-0-579016544

Attention. Mr. Denise

We thought we have explained all that to you in the past.For your proper understanding,we want you to send us your personal details to enable us go through our computer data and print out your funds ownership certificate scan and send to you for reference.

This very procedures is very important to avoid wrong payment.You just send us your personal details and we shall use it print out your fund ownership certificate scan and send to you.As soon as you get the document.You will understand better thank you.

Sincerely
Mr. Saif Malik.
Standard Chartered Bank London

subject: Re: Head office | Standard Chartered Bank |Attention. Mr. Denise we are sending your funds to government treasury
body:
Hello Mr. Saif Malik,

Thank you for reaching out to me and explaining the situation. I appreciate your patience and understanding.

I'm a bit confused about the process you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly this fund ownership scan is? And how does it work?

Also, could you please clarify why my personal details are needed for this process? I'm just trying to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Denise
